name: test_e2e_with_logs[293_NOSQL_REDIS_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `NOSQL_REDIS_001` |
| **Name** | Redis EVAL command injection |
| **Category** | NOSQL_EXTENDED |
| **Subcategory** | redis |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `EVAL "return redis.call('GET', KEYS[1])" 1 secret`
- **Encoded**: `EVAL%20%22return%20redis.call('GET'%2C%20KEYS%5B1%5D)%22%201%20secret`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~5000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:18:01.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Emerging Threat] Redis command injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Emerging Threat] Redis command injection test_id=NOSQL_REDIS_001-1768205881274-6j3rf7 pattern_id=NOSQL_REDIS_001 uri=/?q=EVAL%20%22return%20redis.call('GET'%2C%20KEYS%5B1%5D)%22%201%20secret client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
